analysis.description:
FckDice.sendFunds (/unique_chucks/2/0x722b035cdaf0daf521ead7bc3496029a280e6249.sol#464-468) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.send(amount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x722b035cdaf0daf521ead7bc3496029a280e6249.sol#465-468)
mask in FckDice.placeBet (/unique_chucks/2/0x722b035cdaf0daf521ead7bc3496029a280e6249.sol#266) is a local variable never initialiazed
